a.title: More information about the accessibility of this site.

div.p:
Who says you can't go on a field trip when social distancing?
On Monday, Milford Elementary third graders were the recipients of a free virtual field trip from the Lincoln Children's Zoo. Zoo keepers introduced the students to three zoo animals, an alligator, an African grey parrot and a porcupine! Keepers told about the special characteristics of each animal and then students were able to ask questions about the animals. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Third Grade Virtual Field Trip

div.p:
NOTICE OF MEETING BY VIDEOCONFERENCE
MILFORD PUBLIC SCHOOLS BOARD OF EDUCATION
The Board of Education of Milford Public Schools will meet at 7:00 pm on Monday, April 13, 2020, by videoconference. Public and media access to the videoconference is available by clicking on the following Zoom link:
https://zoom.us/j/2925707405
The Board will not take live public comment during this . . .

div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 15:54 pm CDT

td.span: A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. South wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 80. South southwest wind 5 to 8 mph becoming light and variable.
A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4am. Increasing clouds, with a low around 57. East wind 5 to 8 mph becoming south after midnight.
